cocktails.title: Alexander
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.

cocktails.title: Americano
cocktails.method: Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of Soda Water. Stir gently.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice and a lemon zest.

cocktails.title: Angel Face
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Aviation
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Bee’s Knees
cocktails.method: Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Optionally garnish with a lemon or orange zest.

cocktails.title: Bellini
Between the Sheets
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Black Russian
cocktails.method:
Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. strain ingredients into old fashioned glass filled with ice. NOTE:
WHITE RUSSIAN – Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.

cocktails.title: Bloody Mary
ingredients: Tabasco, Celery Salt, Pepper (Up to taste)
cocktails.method:
Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass. NOTE:
If requested served with ice, pour into highball glass.

cocktails.title: Boulevardier
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a orange zest, optionally a lemon zest.

cocktails.title: Bramble
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish optionally with a lemon slice and blackberries.

cocktails.title: Brandy Crusta
cocktails.method: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into a prepared slim cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Rub a slice of orange (or lemon) around the rim of the glass and dip it in

cocktails.title: Caipirinha
cocktails.method:
Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça. Stir gently to involve ingredients. Note:
Caipiroska – Instead of Cachaça use Vodka;
Caipirissima – Instead of Cachaça use Rum.
Caipirão – Instead of Cachaça use Licor Beirão.

cocktails.title: Canchanchara
cocktails.method: Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

cocktails.title: Cardinale
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Casino
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass with ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lemon zest and a maraschino cherry.

cocktails.title: Champagne Cocktail
cocktails.method: Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac. Pour gently chilled Champagne.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.title: Chartreuse Swizzle
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a tall glass, add pebble ice. With the help of a swizzle stick (or cocktail spoon) mix vigorously, complete by filling the glass with more pebble ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint leaves and grated nutmeg.

cocktails.title: Clover Club
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Corpse Reviver #2
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Cuba Libre
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktails.title: Daiquiri
cocktails.method: In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Dark ‘N’ Stormy
cocktails.method: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a lime wedge or slice.

cocktails.title: Don’s Special Daiquiri
cocktails.method: Blend for a few seconds in a milkshake mixer with  crushed ice and pour into a footed copo glass. Fill the glass with more crushed ice.

cocktails.title: Dry Martini
cocktails.garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with a green olives if requested.

cocktails.title: Espresso Martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Fernandito
cocktails.method: Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola. Gently stir.

cocktails.title: French 75
cocktails.method: Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

cocktails.title: French Connection
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

cocktails.title: French Martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

cocktails.title: Garibaldi
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktails.title: Gin Basil Smash
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and pour into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Gin Fizz
cocktails.method:
Shake all ingredients with ice except soda water. Pour into thin tall Tumbler glass , top with a splash soda water. NOTE:
Serve without ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon slice, optional lemon zest.

cocktails.title: Grand Margarita
cocktails.method: Rim the rock glass with good quality sea salt. Pour the ingredients into the  shaker. Add ice to both glass and shaker. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Strain the drink into the glass.

cocktails.title: Grasshopper
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake briskly for few seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Hanky Panky
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Hemingway Special
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Horse’s Neck
cocktails.method: Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If preferred, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with rind of one lemon spiral.

cocktails.title: IBA Tiki
cocktails.method: In a cocktail shaker muddle a thin slice of Gengibre, Pour all other ingredients. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled Tiki glass filled with pebbled ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with citruses and dehydrated pineapple slice.

cocktails.title: Illegal
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or “on the rocks” in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

cocktails.title: Irish Coffee
cocktails.method: Warm black coffee is poured into a preheated Irish coffee glass. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing. Plain sugar can be replaced with sugar syrup

cocktails.title: John Collins
cocktails.method:
Pour all ingredients directly into highball filled with ice. Stir gently. NOTE:
Use ‘Old Tom’ Gin for Tom Collins.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.title: Jungle Bird
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.

cocktails.title: Kir
cocktails.method:
Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. NOTE:
Kir Royal – Use Champagne instead of white wine

cocktails.title: Last Word
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Lemon Drop Martini
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.title: Mai-Tai
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or an highball glass. * The Martinique molasses rum used by Trader Vic was not an Agricole Rhum but a type of “rummy” from molasses.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime peel.

cocktails.title: Manhattan
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Margarita
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Martinez
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Mary Pickford
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Mimosa
cocktails.method:
Pour orange juice into flute glass and gently pour the sparkling wine. Stir gently. NOTE:
Also known as Buck’s Fizz.

cocktails.title: Mint Julep
cocktails.method: In Julep Stainless Steel Cup gently muddle the mint with sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts.

cocktails.title: Missionary’s Downfall
cocktails.method: Blend all the ingredients with half cup of crushed ice. Serve it in a Coppa grande.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint sprig and a slice of pineapple.

cocktails.title: Mojito
cocktails.method: Mix mint springs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with sprigs of mint and slice of lime.

cocktails.title: Monkey Gland
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Moscow Mule
cocktails.method: In an Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.

cocktails.title: Naked and Famous
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Negroni
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.title: New York Sour
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice. Float the wine on top.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon or orange zest with cherry.

cocktails.title: Old Cuban
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass. Top up with the sparkling wine.

cocktails.title: Old Fashioned
cocktails.method: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Stir gently.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

cocktails.title: Paloma
cocktails.method: Poor the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda. Stir gently.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of lime.

cocktails.title: Paper Plane
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Paradise
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Penicillin
cocktails.method: Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients except for the Islay single malt whisky. Fill the shaker with ice and shake. Fine train into a chilled Old Fashioned glass with ice. Float the single malt whisky on top.

cocktails.title: Pina Colada
cocktails.method:
Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large glass and serve with straws. Note:
Historically a few drops of fresh lime juice was added to taste. 4 slices of fresh pineapple can be used instead of juice
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

cocktails.title: Pisco Punch
cocktails.method: Gentle mash the simple syrup with the cloves, add the remaining ingredients except the wine. Shake vigorously and double strain into a large goblet. Add the wine on top and gently stir.

cocktails.title: Pisco Sour
cocktails.method: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled goblet glass.
cocktails.garnish: Few dashes of Amargo bitters on top as an aromatic garnish.

cocktails.title: Planters Punch
cocktails.method:
Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass. NOTE:
Add dilution up to taste, it can be given by water, ice or fresh juices.

cocktails.title: Porn Star Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Champagne to serve on the side
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double strain into a large chilled cocktail glass. Accompany with a shot of champagne.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with passion fruit cup and sugar.

cocktails.title: Porto Flip
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Rabo de Galo
cocktails.method: Combine all the ingredients into a rocks glass, add ice and stir briefly.

cocktails.title: Ramos Fizz
cocktails.method:
Pour all ingredients except soda water in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake for two minutes, double strain in a glass, pour the drink back in the shaker and hard shake without ice for one minute. Strain into a highball glass, top up with soda. NOTE:
The drink was invented by Henry Ramos in 1888, at his bar Meyer’s Table d’Hôtel Internationale in New Orleans.
The Ramos Fizz was originally shaken for 12 minutes by a crew of 30 bartenders who passed the shaker from one to another.

cocktails.title: Remember the Maine
cocktails.method: Pour the absinthe into a coupe glass and swirl to completely coat the inside. Discard the absinthe and set the glass aside. Add the other ingredients to a mixing glass and fill it 3/4 full with ice. Stir until chilled, then strain into the glass rinsed with the absinthe.

cocktails.title: Russian Spring Punch
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice and top up with sparkling wine.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with blackberries and optionally a lemon slice as well.

cocktails.title: Rusty Nail
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

cocktails.title: Sazerac
cocktails.method:
Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice in a mixing glass. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, strain the mixed drink into the glass. NOTE:
The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, Rye Whiskey substituted Cognac as it became hard to obtain.

cocktails.title: Sea Breeze
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with an orange zest and cherry.

cocktails.title: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

cocktails.title: Sherry Cobbler
cocktails.method: Combine sherry, sugar and 2 quarter wheels each of orange and lemon in a shaker with ice, shake briskly, strain into a Julep cocktail cup filled with crushed ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with fresh berries, ¼ wheel each orange and lemon. Serve with straws.

cocktails.title: Sidecar
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Singapore Sling
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into Hurricane glass.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.title: South Side
cocktails.method:
Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass. Note:
If egg white is used shake vigorously.

cocktails.title: Spicy Fifty
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a red chili pepper.

cocktails.title: Spritz
cocktails.method:
Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice. Stir gently. NOTE:
There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktails.title: Stinger
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Suffering Bastard
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice. Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original. S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with mint spring and optionally an orange slice as well.

cocktails.title: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.method: Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest.

cocktails.title: Three Dots and a Dash
ingredients: 7.5 ml Allspice Saint Elizabeth15 ml Fresh Lime Juice
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients in a Blender with 12 ounces of crushed ice, flash blend, pour the drink into a footed copo glass. Fill the glass with more crushed ice.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with three cherries and a rectangular chunk of pineapple.

cocktails.title: Tipperary
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

cocktails.title: Tommy’s Margarita
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass filled with ice.

cocktails.title: Trinidad Sour
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Tuxedo
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with cherry and lemon zest.

cocktails.title: Ve.N.To
ingredients: 15 ml Honey mix (replace water with chamomile)*
cocktails.method:
Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice. NOTE:
*If desired water can be replaced by chamomile infusion in the honey mix.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and white grapes.

cocktails.title: Vesper
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Vieux Carré
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

cocktails.title: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.method:
Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into cobbler glass. If served “On the rocks”, strain ingredients into old fashioned glass filled with ice. NOTE:
If egg white is used shake little harder to release and incorporate the foam from the egg white.
cocktails.garnish: Garnish with half orange slice and maraschino cherry, optionally use orange zest.

cocktails.title: White Lady
cocktails.method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

cocktails.title: Zombie
cocktails.method:
Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds. Serve in a tall tumbler glass. Note:
*Donn’s Mix: 2 parts of fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part of cinnamon syrup
